metadata.description: Public marketplace for Claude Code plugins and MCP clients from CE Dot Net

plugins.name: ace-orchestration
plugins.description: Code Engine ACE - Intelligent pattern learning with workflow enforcement hooks. NEW v4.2.1: Three-tier hook system (UserPromptSubmit, PostToolUse, PreCompact) enforces ACE Retrieval/Learning workflow, prevents empty playbook. Requires MCP Client v3.9.0+.
